pr_title: Response server common module implementation with dockerfile

timeline.message: Moving response-server-ws to response-module. Associated changes to pom file, added one set of tests, removed HealthController (as it is in common-module now), mockit property files.
modified Dockerfile for new folder structure to include common module implementation
Commit ActiveFiltre change that was breaking the integration tests. This has been doen in PR #653

Update ActiveUserFilter.java

Fixed conditional property
response server common module implementaion with updated docker file
modified linter yml file as per new folder structure
Fixed issue with /v1 being appended to teh URL, that was breaking test cases.
change the reporter to review to fix the linter check failed issue fix
Merge branch 'response-server-module' of https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/fda-mystudies into response-server-module

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@ jobs:
       uses: nikitasavinov/checkstyle-action@master
       with:
         github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
-        reporter: 'github-pr-check'
+        reporter: 'github-pr-review'

replies.bodyText: Due to folder structure change, github-pr-check reporter was failing. Changing the review dog reporter fixed this issue
replies.author: aswinijena100

replies.bodyText: can you elaborate what the failure was and why this fixed it?
replies.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Please attched issue with github-pr-check reporter. By changing this to github-pr-review fixed the issue.
replies.author: aswinijena100

replies.bodyText: You are passing fail-on-error flag and there are unresolved issues reported by reviewdog; this is why your run is failing: https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog#exit-codes
replies.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText:
why this line is added and commented out?
If it is not needed, please remove this line; same with the other commented  line below.
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+FROM mohankgonthina/commonmodule:latest AS maven_builder
+COPY response-server-service /app/response-server-module/response-server-service
+COPY pom.xml /app/response-server-module/
+WORKDIR /app/response-server-module/
+RUN mvn clean package
+
+From tomcat:9.0.33-jdk11-openjdk
+#RUN rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/*

timeline.message: removed commented line and formated pom.xml file
